page.title: 19Where I Live In Peterlee.
page.content:
{Peterlee}is a new town in which lots of different people live, I live in {Westmorland Rise.}There is a{town {centre}in Peterlee and there are lots of shops in the town centre. There is also a place called{York Road}where there are some more shops.
Nearby there is a pub called the{Argus {Butterfly,}which is named after a butterfly that is only found in{Castle {Eden Dene}(about 2 miles away from Peterlee).
In{Westmorland Rise}there are no parks or playgrounds, but there are lots of open spaces to play on.
There is an school near Westmorland Rise which is closing down soon, it is called{Dene House Comprehensive Annexe.
